title: Trying to use previous Thunderbird profile
content:
I've used Tbird for 20 years. I keep my email files & such on a separate partition/drive from where Windows is. I recently had to reinstall Windows 11, which effectively uninstalled Tbird. I reinstalled and tried to get my profiles.ini to point to that previous profile so Tbird could see the 20 years' worth of saved emails as well as the ones from this year. I've tried several times and all failed. I've put the exact name & path of the profile I want in each location of profiles.ini with IsRelative=0, and told Tbird to use the name when it starts, but that has failed repeatedly. I had to uninstall/reinstall Tbird bc I'd managed to FUBAR profiles.ini Help?

The profile I want to use is E:\TbirdMail\ko07yqoy.slt

Current profile.ini: [InstallB8CB05495C44C742] Default=C:\Users\pixda\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird Locked=1

[Profile1] Name=default IsRelative=0 Path=C:\Users\pixda\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird Default=0

[Profile0] Name=default-release IsRelative=1 Path=Profiles/pteabyby.default

[General] StartWithLastProfile=0 Version=2
creator: dennyw0713

title: Emails not being sent
content:
I'm using TB 115.3.1 on a Mac

I just got a text message from somebody saying he hadn't received an email that I sent two days ago.

I was trying to find the status of that email, and I looked in a folder called Outbox - and it was filled with every email I thought I had sent for the past 3 days. Email were piled up in there - not sent. And I received no notification from Thunderbird that these emails weren't going out. Thunderbird was silently filling up the Outbox with unsent emails.

I use three different email addresses, and all emails I have tried to send from all addresses are not being sent.

I couldn't find any way to force TB to send these emails.

I found that if I right-click on an email, there is an option to "edit as new". I clicked on that on a couple of the emails and tried to send them again - and they just kept piling up in the Outbox.

HELP PLEASE!
creator: clintoconner2

title: POST DATED SPAM EMAILS
content: I am receiving several post dated emails each day. What purpose is served by post dating these emails? How can I block the emails? Thanks Greg

title: Yhteyteni aikakatkaistu kohteeseen webmail.inet.fi
content:
Totesin 27.12.2023 teiltä tulleen ilmoituksen yhteyteni aikakatkaisusta kohteeseen webmail.inet.fi. Poistaessani tänään 28.12.2023 saapuneita viestejä en löytänyt niitä roskakorista, josta olen tottunut poistamaan ne lopullisesti. En myöskään saanut näkyviin arkistoimiani sähköpostiviestejä. En ole päässyt yli viikkoon sisälle maksamaani sukututkimusohjelmaan, mutta tilaamaani verkkolehteen olen päässyt tallettamallani salasanalla normaalisti. Pyydän palauttamaan sähköpostini normaaliksi tai ilmoittamaan minulle, miksi sähköpostini käyttö on vaikeutunut.

Ystävällisin yhteistyöterveisin Kaarlo Erjala
creator: kaarlo.erjala

title: Thunderbird working on external hard drive (another partition)
content:
I have an HD (main, operating system) that is full. And I can't download emails from Thunderbird anymore.

But I have another external hard drive with enough space (which even use for Thunderbird backup). I would like to make my current Thunderbird (from the operating system) work directly on the external hard drive. It's possible?

Thanks! ;-)

My versions: . OS: Debian 5.10.0-26-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 5.10.197-1 (2023-09-29) x86_64 GNU/Linux . Thunderbird: 115.5.0 (64-bit) / Supernova

title: automatic update is not possible
content: Good day, automatic updates cannot be performed. It always ends with an error. The data will start downloading but will not install. I run Thunderbird as an administrator, it didn't help. Restarting the PC didn't help. I have windows 10
creator: Jakub.Fojtik

title: deleted emails
content:
I have had some critical emails vanish on me. I did not delete them. They are simply not there any longer. Where have they gone and why did they go there? I've gone through every folder in my tree with no luck. I can't imagine what might have happened to these emails but I can guarantee that i did not delete them. Their value was to obvious and clear to ever contemplate such a move. they were from August of 2023. My trash folders only go back to November of 2023. I made a payment to Mozilla for Thunderbird. Is there any chance that that payment resulted in an updated application that wiped out some files?

My life won't end if I can't restore these emails. But it will' 'be a devastating loss.
creator: jimerie

title: Unable to send messages using Thunderbird
content: I am using Thunderbird v.115.5.2 and ever since the latest upgrade I cannot send messages. I get the message "sending messages failed ........ the connection to smtp.office365.com timed out". On my other computer the same message appears "sending the message failed ........ the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp-mail.outlook.com timed out". Sometimes, if I continue to try and send, the message will be sent after many, many attempts. Is there a solution?

title: Yahoo mail impossibile accedere
content: Ho letto tutto quello che ho trovato ma non c'è verso di scaricare la posta di un account Yahoo/Aol. Thunderbird versione 115.6.0 rileva perfettamente i parametri compresa l'autenticazione, si apre la finestra del browser dove inserisco correttamente la password della yahoo mail ma niente da fare, Thunderbird prova per 30 secondi ad inviare le info ma ritorna sempre errore. Non è neanche possibile usare il "genera password" di yahoo perchè mi dice "Non disponibile" (sul sito di Yahoo mail). Deduco di dover usare un altro client per queste mail di Yahoo ??? Grazie ! BigSpectrum

title: přesun Thunderbirdu na nový počítač
content:
Podle návodu na Support Mozilla jsem na starém počítači zkopíroval obsah složky ...Roaming/Thunderbird na flashdisk, ten přesunul na nový počítač a dle návodu jsem jsem jím nahradil složku Thunderbird. Thunderbird data nenačetl.

Opakoval jsem postup, přenesl jsem data ze starého na nový a přeinstaloval Thunderbird. Opět data nenačetl. Kde se stala chyba?

Předem děkuji. Miroslav Valenz

title: Corrupted Email
content:
For the last few weeks, I have had a strange problem with Thunderbird. I receive an email that shows in the email list with the subject, from, and date of the real email. However, the body of the email is from some other email, and corrupted at that. I showed one jpg that shows the email listing, and 3 jpgs that capture how the first part of the email appears in Thunderbird. Even though I don't have the headers expanded, I see detailed header-type information. I captured down to where the body of the message starts in case something in all that apparent expanded header provides a clue. When I look at the email on my Google web account, it is fine. It only shows this way in Thunderbird. It has only happened about 3 times in the last 2-3 weeks. The body I see, by the way, seems to be the same every time. I am hoping someone has some ideas.

In most cases, it has been an email I did not really need anyway, so I just deleted it. One was a needed email, so I opened it in the Google web interface and forwarded it to a different account, where it showed fine.

Thanks again for any advice. I am currently using TB 115.6.0 in Windows 10. However, it has happened on the earlier versions I had over those past couple of weeks.
creator: marklang

title: donation and thunderbird issues
content:
ok now look I just downloaded thunderbird, I have not used it for years, so I was with bluemail but that is giving me grief.

Now i am trying out your system so before I donate money, can you let me know if it is possible to add six different emails into this Free version of thunderbird, I just want to know if it is working, I have a few online start ups and I need access to six emails only.

It looks like thunderbird is not sending out some emails. and it recieves the new emails at the bottom of the list instead of at the top.

With the horror of disgusting corporate greed today, where can I learn to build decentralised applications, because of the corruption today blocking out small businesses, I am now looking at building decentralised software and will perhaps make them open source because of all this nasty corruption going on today. I am already a full stack dev with 20 yrs exp.

Now I want to move my existing innovations to decentralised architecture.
creator: mark.webley

title: Thunderbird Update Window
content:
Before I updated to Supernova, when I opened Thunderbird and there was an update available, a window would automatically open in Thunderbird showing the available update (screenshot attached), which allowed me to read the Release Notes to see what was being updated, before applying the update.

However, since updating to Supernova, this no longer happens.

I have always had my settings set to General / Updates / Check for updates, but let me choose whether to install them and as I said, this worked until updating to Supernova.

So can someone tell me what I need to do, to get the update window opening automatically again?

Thanks.
creator: RedJock_46

title: Emails get deleted when I press Enter key
content:
Hello,

I have been having this issue for months. Sometimes I will be deleting emails, I will hit "delete" on the keyboard, and it will delete the email that I wanted to delete. But then I will press the "Enter" key because I want to open an email, and the Enter key will start deleting emails instead of opening them.

How do I fix this? Also, my delete/enter keys are not getting stuck or anything like that.

Thanks! Melissa Capps
creator: Meliza
